name: Venturra Capital
description:
Venturra Capital is an early-stage venture capital firm. Our mission at Venturra is to provide capital, operational empowerment, and market access to founders of innovative, industry-transforming, technology-enabled internet businesses. Venturra Capital will focus on Indonesia and Southeast Asia, and will invest in early growth stage consumer technology-enabled companies including in the eCommerce, financial services, healthcare and education sectors.

Venturra Discovery is the seed investment arm of Venturra Capital.
https://www.linkedin.com/company/venturra-discovery/
https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/venturra-discovery
